original: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: tatas rājā aśokaḥ sthavira upaguptasya vismaya janana artham sundaram ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāram gataḥ
tatra upagupta pramukhāṇi aṣṭādaśa arhat sahasrāṇi nivasanti
tad dviguṇāḥ śaikṣāḥ pṛthagjana kalyāṇakāḥ

original: tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
analyzed: tatas sa sthavirasya pāda abhivandanam kṛtvā purastāt niṣaṇṇaḥ dharma śravaṇāya
sthavira upaguptena asya dharmaḥ deśitaḥ

original: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ paripakva saṃtatiḥ dharmam śrutvā pravrajyā abhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ

original: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
